Package com.jcabi.jdbc

JDBC wrapper.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    JdbcSession.Fetcher
    The fetcher.
    JdbcSession.Handler<T>
    Handler or ResultSet.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    JdbcSession
    Universal JDBC wrapper.
    NotEmptyHandler
    Returns TRUE if at least one SQL record found in ResultSet.
    SingleHandler<T>
    Handler that returns first column in the first row.
    Utc
    UTC time zone manipulator.
    VoidHandler
    Handler that does nothing (and always returns null).

Package com.jcabi.jdbc Description

JDBC wrapper.

The only dependency you need is (check our latest version available at www.jcabi.com): 

<depedency>
   <groupId>com.jcabi</groupId>
   <artifactId>jcabi-jdbc</artifactId>
 </dependency>
Since:
0.1.8
Version:
$Id$
Author:
Yegor Bugayenko (yegor@tpc2.com)
